issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Try to run diskbalancer when one of the blockpools are empty on a Federated cluster.

diskbalancer process run and completes successfully within seconds. Actual disk balancing does not happen. 

cc - [~bharatviswa], [~anu]
fields.summary: diskbalancer does not work if one of the blockpools are empty on a Federated cluster

comments.body: This also fixed isValidBlock andÂ isValidRbw also, if block passed is null, current code throws NPE. Changed the code to return false.

[~bharatviswa] There is a small typo in the name of the patch. It should be 13*7*15, instead of 13175. Can you please rename when you get a chance ? Thanks in advance.

Â

Thank You [~anu] for checking it.

uploaded patch with the correct name.
+1, pending Jenkins. Thanks for taking care of this issue.
